attributes.action: Save MoSI - The Museum of Science and Industry
attributes.additional_details:
MoSI shows all people what a great scientific and industrial heritage this country has. It inspires children to become scientists, engineers and technicians - how to make things, have ideas, to innovate and to be creative.

It is maybe because we have abandoned so much of our manufacturing and engineering industry in recent decades that we apparently can 'no longer afford' free admission to such a world-class facility.
